TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ComponentTray extends System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl implements class System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider
Public Class ComponentTray Inherits ScrollableControl Implements IExtenderProvider
type ComponentTray = class inherit ScrollableControl interface IExtenderProvider

summary.span: 在设计器的组件栏提供行为。

span.span: Provides behavior for the component tray of a designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组件栏表示不另外提供一个可视界面，在设计时组件，并提供一种方法，用户可访问和设置这些组件的属性。The component tray represents components that do not otherwise provide a visible surface at design time and provides a way for users to access and set the properties of those components. 某些类型的组件，如，可能没有一个用户界面，可以在设计时查看。Some types of components, such as a , may not have a user interface that can be viewed at design time. 这些组件通常由在组件栏中显示的图标表示。These components are usually represented by icons that are shown in the component tray. 组件栏是处于活动状态后显示在设计视图模式中的设计视图窗口底部的矩形区域。The component tray is a rectangular region displayed at the bottom of the design view window while in design view mode, once it is active. 在组件栏中显示的组件已添加到或属于当前文档后，组件栏变为活动状态在设计视图中。The component tray becomes active in design view after a component that is displayed in the component tray has been added to or is part of the current document.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified designer and service provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组件栏监视的组件添加和删除，并显示相应的用户界面对象，表示它包含的组件。The component tray monitors component additions and removals and displays appropriate user interface objects to represent the components it contains.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放任何托管对象所持有的所有资源，此的引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).
